title: Crossing of proverbs The second part. With, Certaine briefe questions and answeres. By B.N. Gent.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: Printed [By G. Eld] for Iohn Wright, and are to be solde at his shop without Newgate, at the signe of the Bible,
